title: Ecological care as spiritual and ethical practice
description: Ecological care as spiritual and ethical practice
content:
Scenario: Ecological care as spiritual and ethical practice
    Given Kenji's environmental values are deeply held
    And ecological care connects to meaning and purpose
    When the bioregional_elohim supports Kenji's values
    Then it should recognize ecological stewardship as ethical practice
    And it should validate his care for planet as meaningful
    And it should connect ecological care to larger purpose
    And it should support integration of values across life domains
    And the system should honor ecological care as spiritual practice
    And Kenji should experience planetary care as part of life meaning
